Game.Name: Backyard Sports - Football 2007 (USA)
Game.plot: Backyard Sports Football 2007 is a Football game, developed by Humongous Entertainment and published by Atari, which was released in 2006.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/933485.html
Game.Notes: Backyard Football 2007 brings kid-sized professional football players and the Backyard Kids together for another round of arcade football. The game gives players total control of the style, location, pace, and strategy of the game. Spectacular graphics, crazy effects & addictive gameplay make Backyard Football 2007 a great way for young football fans to the game and live out their sports fantasy.
